publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1656 Dr Jean Turner: Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland—That the Parliament is concerned about the centralisation of health services across Scotland; believes that there must be a clear national strategy for the future structure of the NHS in Scotland, and therefore calls on the Scottish Executive to suspend all planned reorganisations while a national strategy is developed involving the public and health professionals. Supported by: Mr David Davidson*, Christine Grahame*, Bruce Crawford*, Murray Tosh*, John Swinburne*, Campbell Martin*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Alex Fergusson*, Bill Aitken*

S2M-1656 Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland (lodged on 7 September 2004) Rob Gibson*, Eleanor Scott*, Jim Mather*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Shona Robison*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tricia Marwick*, Mary Scanlon*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-1656 Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland (lodged on 7 September 2004) Chris Ballance*, Patrick Harvie*, Miss Annabel Goldie*

S2M-1656 Dr Jean Turner: Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland—That the Parliament is concerned about the centralisation of health services across Scotland; believes that there must be a clear national strategy for the future structure of the NHS in Scotland, and therefore calls on the Scottish Executive to suspend all planned reorganisations while a national strategy is developed involving the public and health professionals. Supported by: Mr David Davidson, Christine Grahame, Bruce Crawford, Murray Tosh, John Swinburne, Campbell Martin, Mrs Nanette Milne, Stewart Stevenson, Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Alex Fergusson, Bill Aitken, Rob Gibson, Eleanor Scott, Jim Mather, Mr Bruce McFee, Shona Robison, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Tricia Marwick, Mary Scanlon, Fiona Hyslop, Chris Ballance, Patrick Harvie, Miss Annabel Goldie, Robin Harper*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Fergus Ewing*
S2M-1656 Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland (lodged on 7 September 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1656 Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland (lodged on 7 September 2004) Phil Gallie*, Frances Curran*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1656 Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland (lodged on 7 September 2004) Richard Lochhead*
S2M-1656 Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland (lodged on 7 September 2004) Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-1656 Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland (lodged on 7 September 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-1656 Centralisation of Health Services in Scotland (lodged on 7 September 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
